panels.description: Maximum latency of selected volumes.
panels.title: Volume Deep Dive: $Volume

panels.description: This panel displays volume performance details.
panels.title: Volume Performance

panels.description: This panel displays detail of average amount of data read per read operation.
panels.title: Max Read Op Size

panels.description: This panel displays detail of average amount of data write per write operation.
panels.title: Max Write Op Size

panels.description: Average latency of selected volumes.
panels.title: Avg Latency

panels.description: Maximum latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process all the operations on the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Max Latency

panels.description: Number of read operations per second from the selected volumes.
panels.title: Read IOPs

panels.description: Number of write operations per second from the selected volumes.
panels.title: Write IOPs

panels.description: Number of other operations per second from the selected volumes.
panels.title: Other IOPs

panels.description: Bytes read per second from the volume.
panels.title: Read Throughput

panels.description: Bytes written per second to the volume.
panels.title: Write Throughput

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process read request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Read Latency

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process write request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Write Latency

panels.description: Summation of NFS ops, CIFS ops, CSS ops and internal ops.
panels.title: Qtrees by IOPs

panels.description: Volume details.
panels.title: Volumes in Cluster

panels.description: This panel displays detail of physical size, physical space used, logical space used and size used of the volume, in bytes.
panels.title: Per Volume Space Used

panels.description: This panel displays detail of physical used %, logical used % and size used % of the volume.
panels.title: Per Volume Space Used Percent

panels.description: This panel displays detail of snapshot available size, snapshot reserve size, snapshot reserve available and snapshots size used of the volume.
panels.title: Per Volume Snapshot Space Used

panels.description: This panel displays detail of snapshot reserve %, snapshot reserve used % and size used % of the volume.
panels.title: Per Volume Snapshot Space Used Percent

panels.description: Number of user-visible files (inodes) used. This field is valid only when the volume is online.
panels.title: Inode Files Used

panels.description: Total user-visible file (inode) count, i.e., current maximum number of user-visible files (inodes) that this volume can currently hold.
panels.title: Inode Files Total

panels.description: volume_inode_files_used / volume_inode_total.
panels.title: Inode Files Used Percentage
